events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but I want to request a refund because it doesn't fit as expected.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request after reviewing the customer's message about the jacket.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the refund request regarding the jacket purchase.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m here to assist you with your refund request for the jacket.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been used or if it’s in its original condition?
My order number is 4538291. The jacket is brand new, I tried it on once but haven't worn it outside.
Thank you for the details. We can process a full refund once the jacket is returned. I will email you the return label shortly.
Thanks, I appreciate the quick response. I will send the jacket back using the return label you send me.
We have received your returned jacket and processed the full refund to your original payment method.
Just checking in to make sure you received the refund and if there’s anything else we can assist you with.
Since the refund has been received and the matter resolved, we are closing this support case. Thank you for contacting us.
